Title: Directs the creation of a document giving certain notice to parents and guardians of school age students who are diagnosed with a life-threatening medical condition or a certain medical condition
Summary: Enacts the "Shepherd Patterson law"; directs the creation of a document giving certain notice to parents and guardians of school age students who are diagnosed with a life-threatening medical condition or a medical condition that may cause a disability.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to creating a document giving notice to parents and guardians of school age students who are diagnosed with a life-threatening medical condition or a medical condition that may cause a disability
